@alexmonroe87 while there is probably a good feature request here, we need this to be a lot more precise for it to be useful.

One can use different instantiations of optimizers for variables with different learning rates to get per-layer learning rates. I also don't know what a 'learning rate mask' is, so I'm not sure why it's hard.

It would be helpful to detail the use case more. It's possible that what you want to do is possible in TF, but may require a little effort to think more declaratively, and we can't know unless we see a more concrete use case.
